text: to enroll himself with Mary, the woman who had been betrothed to him,That is what the Text says. We know from Matthew 1:24-25 that Joseph had already received her as his wife, but still had not had sexual relations with her—obviously an atypical situation. He had taken responsibility for her as his wife, but as far as sex was concerned she was still ‘pledged’—thus Luke's unusual turn of phrase. who was pregnant.
